description: Parts of a cliff and granite wall collapsed following heavy rainfall.
title: Landslide closes Guernsey cliff path steps
title_page: Landslide closes Guernsey cliff path steps - BBC News
maintext: "During this very wet weather some cliff and coastal paths may be deep with water and mud, steps may also be very muddy and walkers should consider their own safety, particularly if they are walking during early mornings and evenings when light levels are low."
